Translations.Text: M’ayi wo (sε Mesomafoͻ) enti tie Adiyisεm a yεreyi (akyerε woͻ no)
“Nokorε sε, Me ne Nyankopͻn, awurade foforͻ biara nni hͻ gyesε Menko ara, enti som Me, na frε Nyame fa kaekae Me “
Nokorε sε Dͻnhwere no reba, aka kakraabi sε M’ada no adi sεdeε Metua ͻkra biara mmͻdemmͻ a, ͻbͻeε no so ka
Enti hwε na w’amma obi a ͻnye nnie, na odi n’apεdeε akyire no antwe wo amfri (Nokorε no) ho amma w’annkͻsopa
“Mose, εdeεn na εwͻ wonsa nifa mu no?”
Mose kaa sε: “Ɛyε mepoma: Metu twene no, mede bubu wira ma menyεmmoa, na mewͻ nneεma foforͻ bi nso a me de yε “
Nyankopͻn kaa sε: “Mose, fa to fͻm .“
Enti ͻto twenee fͻm, na hwε; ͻwͻ a ͻretwe ne ho aseε bi nie
Nyankopͻn kaa sε: “Sͻ no mu, ensuro. Yε’bεsan de no aba sεdeε na ͻteε kane no ara
Twe wonsa bra wonkyεn mu, εbepue aba fitaa a ͻhaw biara nniho, (woi nso) yε nsεnkyerεnee foforͻ
Sεdeε Yε’bεkyerε wo Yεn nsεnkyerεnee akεseε no mu bie
Kͻ Farao hͻ, nokorε sε wayε bͻne atra so
(Mose) kaa sε: ”Me Wura Nyanko-pͻn, bue makoma mu ma me
Na ma me dwumadie yi nyε bͻkͻͻ ma me
Na sane apͻ a εwͻ me kεterεma soͻ no
Sεdeε wͻ’bεte m’asεm aseε
Na mame boafoͻ fri m’abusua mu
(a, ͻne) Me nua Aaron
Na fa no so hyε me den
Na fa no bata me dwumadie no ho
Sεdeε yε’bεbͻ wo abodin kεse
Na y’akaekae wo kεse
Nokorε sε Wona Wohu yεn (aberε biara)
Nyankopͻn kaa sε: ”Mose, ampa sε yεde w’abisa deε no ama wo“
Ampa nso sε, Yε’de Y’adom ama wo pεn wͻ εberε bi
